definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.chinese: 樹民族品牌，立百年基業。

sentences.english: However, Zhao Yang in the Foundation for more than a century.
sentences.chinese: 但趙氏在晉陽的基業已逾百年。

sentences.english: Corporate culture is to maintain the fundamental business foundation evergreen. Wuhan Dongxin com.
sentences.chinese: 企業文化是保持企業基業常青的根本。

sentences.english: Giving thanks unto the Father, which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light
sentences.chinese: 又感謝父，叫我們能與衆聖徒在光明中同得基業。
